author: degano
body:
The patch geant4-10.0-dynamic-TLS.patch could not be applied anymore, however the "-ftls-model=global-dynamic" option is now by default on in Geant4MakeRules_cxx.cmake and Linux-g++.gmk.
It is instead missing for Darwing clang compiler in Darwin-clang.gmk and should be re-added if needed.
title: Geant 4.10 updated to patch01.
